body_content.explanation: the process of removing a formal or official title or description from a person, an organization, etc., usually so that they no longer have the right to do something:
examples: Failure to enforce all provisions of the Act may result in decertification of your organization.

body_content.explanation: the process of removing someone's official qualification to do a particular job, taking away their legal right to do it:
examples: Only a tiny minority of law enforcement officers ever face the ultimate disciplinary action of decertification.
